document_data.name: Words to all Wizards
document_data.author: [[Melliyechorl Varast]]
document_data.mainbody:
'''''Words to all Wizards''''' was a [[book]] written by [[Melliyechorl Varast]], Master Teacher of [[Archmages of the Inner Fire]], also known as the Defenders of [[Halruaa]], and published in the {{YearlinkName|1347}}.{{Cite polyhedron/104/Elminster's Everwinking Eye: Country Treasures|7}}{{Cite web/The Candlekeep Collection}}
{{quote|Treasures are strange things: to some, love and friendship; to others, power and influence; to still others, gems, rare metal, or trapped magic. What each being values most, or considers treasure at all, is a large measure of who or what being really is.|Except from ''Words to all Wizards''}}
document_data.Contents: It was a collection of the mage's advice.
document_data.History: The original was kept in the great fortress-library of [[Candlekeep]] around [[1372 DR]].
